text: Edward Charles "Chuck" Knoblauch (born July 7, 1968) is a retired Major League Baseball player. He played for the Minnesota Twins (1991-97), New York Yankees (1998-2001) and Kansas City Royals (2002). He played mostly as a second baseman before moving to left field for his last two seasons. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1175848/ IMDB Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:New York Yankees players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Minnesota Twins players
title: Chuck Knoblauch
